  • Ripped Stuff

As a turbonerd, I love messing around with computery stuff.

Sometimes, purely out of interest, I may disassemble an old amiga demo or cracktro, y'know, for... fun.

This little app helps me to do it faster. That's it.

Here's a picture of a cracktro for 'mayzing fun:

Here are some of the files I've ripped directly from cracktros/demos (converted to PNG files).

The creator of any media here owns its copyright. If you are that owner and want anything removed, just ask.

The bob logo from Oracle's Colony cracktro. 224x60 in 3 bit planes (8 colours).

The font from Oracle's Bomber Bob cracktro. 320x160 in 4 bit planes (16 colours).

Angel Dawn's famous - and quite excellent - logo for Fairlight; used in lots of productions. 320x142 in 5 bit planes (32 colours).

The logo from Skid Row's 3D World Soccer cracktro. 320x58 in 4 bit planes (16 colours).

The logo from Anarchy's Bob intro. 288x73 in 4 bit planes (16 colours).

The logo from Excel's Demo Disk 15 intro. 320x200 in 4 bit planes (16 colours).

The 'zoom' logo from Anarchy's In the Kitchen demo. 352x30 in 5 bit planes (32 colours).

The ball bobs used in Oracle's Bomber Bob Cracktro. 384x78 in 4 bit planes (16 colours).

The logo used in Slipstream's Skate Tribe cracktro. 320x84 in 4 bit planes (16 colours).

The logo used in Anarchy's Dolly Mixture 02 intro. 320x65 in 4 bit planes (16 colours).

The font used in the end part of Anarchy's In the Kitchen demo. 320x48 in 2 bit planes (4 colours).

The animated bobs used in the end part of Anarchy's In the Kitchen demo. 16x224 in 3 bit planes (8 colours).

The font used in the 'lovely rasters' part of the Dragons Megademo. 320x152 in 3 bit planes (8 colours).

The 'insert disk 2' image used in Hardwired by Crionics. 224x232 in 4 bit planes (16 colours).

The face used in multiple parts of Anarchy's In the Kitchen. 352x178 in 1 bit plane (2 colours).

The font used in the 'multi scroll' part of the Dragons Megademo. There were 13 colour palettes used for the different scroller colours. 320x160 in 4 bit planes (16 colours).

The font used in Oracle's Colony cracktro. 640x256 in 2 bit planes (4 colours).

The image used in the loader of the Dragons Megademo. 368x245 in 5 bit planes (32 colours).

The animated chains from Razor 1991's Kick Reset intro. 576x447 in 2 bit planes (4 colours).

The logo from Razor 1991's Continuum cracktro. 320x70 in 5 bit planes (32 colours).

The bobs from the 'unlimited bobs' part of the Dragons Megademo. The original bob is 32x15 in 3 bit planes (8 colours) but this is an image of all bob colours used in the part.

The font used in the 'perspective scroll' part of Anarchy's In the Kitchen demo. 320x520 in 3 bit planes (8 colours).

The logo from the Splatter House cracktro by Scoopex. 320x58 in 5 bit planes (32 colours).

The logo from the Budokan cracktro by Oracle. 320x86 in 5 bit planes (32 colours).

The logo from Red Sector's Follow Me demo. 320x93 in 4 bit planes (16 colours).

The font from Red Sector's Follow Me demo. 288x197 in 3 bit planes (8 colours).

The intro screen from Red Sector's Follow Me demo. 320x193 in 5 bit planes (32 colours).

The main screen from Red Sector's Follow Me demo. 320x193 in 5 bit planes (32 colours).

The face animation from Red Sector's Follow Me demo. 240x32 in 5 bit planes (32 colours).

The hand animation from Red Sector's Follow Me demo. 576x68 in 5 bit planes (32 colours).

The font from Excel's Demo Disk 15 intro. 16x1024 in 2 bit planes (4 colours).
